summary: Luis enjoys the liberty of being single. He has a smell for perfumes and thus money. However, his 5 sisters and mom believe that at 43, he should be looking for a wife, not one-night stands. They find candi/dates. He hires a "fiancée".
cast: Alain Chabat|Charlotte Gainsbourg|Bernadette Lafont|Wladimir Yordanoff|Grégoire Oestermann|Véronique Barrault|Marie-Armelle Deguy|Katia Lewkowicz|Louise Monot|Luce Mouchel|Christiane Millet|Aïssa Maïga|Tatiana Gousseff|Alix de Konopka|Eric Debrosse|Fred Bianconi|Christophe Kourotchkine|Virginie Bordes|Meriem Serbah|Patrick Bordier|Zachary Pons|Aurélie Boquien|Arnaud Maillard|Denis Maréchal|Anne Marivin|Anne-Hélène Pfaff|Olivier Rosemberg|Mathilda Brissy|Ornela Berçon|Laura Jurie|Amandine de Monartoff|Marina Distinguin|Elise Distinguin|Pauline de Monartoff|Charlotte Fornaro|Lola Berçon|Lou-Ann Castelli|Marline Brun|Eva Le Bouche|Philippe Guiraud|Philippe Fléchaire|Lazare Lartigau|Flore Gautherie|Christian Yvart|Lybert Ramade|Céline Bansart|Olivia Jerkovic|Yaëlle Karp|Christine Mus|Pénélope Perdereau|Brigitte Lo Cicero
title: Prête-moi ta main
